sources.title: Old Spanish Customers
sources.description: Bill, a bumbling, dim-witted fellow and his shrewish wife win a holiday to Spain at a Whist tournament. Along the way, he and a famous Matador named Tormito get into an altercation, leaving Bill in the bullfighter's clothes. Separated from his wife, he's taken for Tormito by the natives, and forced into a match at the local arena.

metadata.Plot: Bill, a bumbling, dim-witted fellow and his shrewish wife win a holiday to Spain at a Whist tournament. Along the way, he and a famous Matador named Tormito get into an altercation, leaving Bill in the bullfighter's clothes. Seperated from his wife, he's taken for Tormito by the natives, and forced into a match at the local arena.
metadata.Writer: Syd Courtenay, Edwin Greenwood, Lola Harvey
metadata.Actors: Leslie Fuller, Binnie Barnes, Drusilla Wills
